title: All my yesterdays' replays don't work!
body: All my replays expired today after updating the new patch. I just had some really important moments yesterday. I understand that patch changing would disable replays, but at least let me play my yesterday's replay so I  can record...  :D

replies.body:
Lew with the assist!!! {{summoner:31}} 

Once a new patch comes out, your older replays won't work since they were running off the old patch files. As of now, there isn't a way for you to keep those replays other than turning them into highlights before the patch drops.
Replay files only work in the patch they were downloaded during and you can't view them after a new patch.
